meanings.definition: A person who enjoys staying at home rather than going out.
meanings.sent1: My sister is a homebody who prefers reading books at home.
meanings.sent2: Homebodies like to relax in the comfort of their own house.
meanings.sent3: The group of homebodies decided to have a movie night in instead of going to the crowded cinema.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of adventurers, she stood out as a true homebody, finding joy in the simple pleasures of her cozy living room.
meanings.sent5: The homebodies' sanctuary was their peaceful abode, where they felt most content.
